overview:
A trail-blazer in the cellular applications market, Shimon Constante is a Co-Founder and CEO of mPortico, a mobile media company which has developed a universal platform for improving the delivery of rich content â€“ such as video, gaming, advertising and ring-tones â€“ over memory cards for use with mobile phones. In this capacity, he applies nearly a decade of experience in corporate entrepreneurship and management in technology companies.

Shimon previously served in various managerial positions in hi-tech companies, where he took a leading role in developing their marketing and market-penetration strategies. In addition to the mobile market, Shimon has broad experience in the online and gaming sectors.

Prior to founding mPortico, Shimon was the Head of Mobile Business Development at 888 Holdings (888.com), an online entertainment company. Earlier, Shimon was the Head of Technology and Business Research at Aduva, a privately-held technology company.

Shimon currently serves on the boards of directors of Cidway Security, a world leader in mobile device security, access management, authentication and payment technology, and Phantom Fiber (PHFB.OB) a leading developer of technology-driven wireless software applications and mobile solutions.

Shimon holds an Executive MBA from Kellogg, Northwestern University.
